mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diet_plans(user_id, title, content, is_shared, is_primary, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isShared}, #{isPrimary}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM diet_plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY title
